Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: An update on the Blockpass project:  Our Token Distribution Event is well underway. You can find the official distributors of PASS tokens on our website www.blockpass.org  We're at a number of events, including this week at the Blockchain Summit in London and the Blockchain Expo in Amsterdam. Come and meet us at these events for more info about Blockpass and the importance of self-sovereign identity.  We also have regular articles on our blog. Two of the most recent ones look at the issues raised in Tezos' retroactive KYC decision and methods to use to identify a good ICO.

Author: DrHans
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: We're excited to announce Blockpass's official global launch in London this 19th of April 2018 at The Design Museum in Kensington High. The evening reception will be held in the Helene & Johannes Huth Gallery with evening drinks and light canapes followed with speeches from our founders and the much awaited Blockpass application demonstration.  Blockpass is a blockchain-based identity protocol for the connected world . The goal of Blockpass is global realization of identity for the Internet of Everything. Through the use of blockchain technology and smart contracts, Blockpass is a production ready Regtech platform offering shared regulatory and compliance services for humans, companies, objects and devices. As this identity system supports verification of humans (KYC), objects (KYO) and connected devices (KYD), it will enable the development of new applications that rely on a trusted connection between human and device identities.  To attend the product launch in London, please send us an email: marketing AT blockpass.org  For more information and updates, please visit and sign up to the following:  Promotional video: https://youtu.be/SvO2cw3e-SI Telegram: https://t.me/blockpass Medium: https://medium.com/@blockpass Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlockpassOrg Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blockpassorg/ Website: http://www.blockpass.org  Come see Blockpass on the following event road show - 18 Apr- Blockchain Expo London 19 Apr- Blockpass Identity App 1.0 Launch London 20 Apr - Meetup London             26 Apr- Blockchain Summit Frankfurt 27 Apr - Meetup Frankfurt 20 May - Blockpass Launch Tokyo 31 May-  Blockpass (PASS) Token Distribution Event Hong Kong 2 June - Meetup Hong Kong

Author: DrHans
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: Correct dates for Blockpass events will be... 18 Apr- Blockchain Expo London 19 Apr- Blockpass Identity App 1.0 Launch London 20 Apr - Meetup London            26 Apr- Blockchain Summit Frankfurt 27 Apr - Meetup Frankfurt 12 May - Blockpass Launch Tokyo 31 May-  Blockpass (PASS) Token Distribution Event Hong Kong 2 June - Meetup Hong Kong

Author: DrHans
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: Blockpass Project and Token Distribution Event  We have built a user-centric, self-sovereign identity solution for regulated industries and the Internet of Everything. Our KYC product is already available for iPhone and Android phones.  We are starting the initial distribution of the Blockpass token (PASS) from 31st May to 30th November via Official Distributors. The purpose of the token is to expand the network of users of Blockpass. When a user receives the token they will need to download the product and conduct KYC with the Blockpass Foundation before they are able to transfer the token on; we refer to this as ‚ÄòSender KYC‚Äô). The utility of the token is to obtain discount on verification services provided by Blockpass as well as ‚Äúidentity mining‚Äù which rewards users and enterprises providing services for identity verification.  Project name: Blockpass  Token name: PASS  Token Distribution Event: The token distribution event (TDE) will take place from 31st May to 30th November 2018.  A TDE is distinct from an ICO in that it utilizes distributors.  Social Media / Important Links: Website: http://www.blockpass.org Promotional video: https://youtu.be/SvO2cw3e-SI Medium: https://medium.com/@blockpass Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlockpassOrg Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blockpassorg/ Telegram: https://t.me/blockpass  Issuer: Token is issued by Blockpass Foundation registered and licensed in the Isle of Man     Token Allocation: Token has not been issued yet. Token to be issued 31 May 2018.  (more detail in next post)   Live Product Details: Blockpass v. 1.0 Apple Store    https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/blockpass/id1322917010 Android    https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.blockpass_mobile  Corporate Details: Issuer of token is Blockpass Foundation. Foundation is controlled by Blockpass IDN Limited (company incorporated in Hong Kong)   BLOCKPASS IDN LIMITED Incorporation number    2566786 Incorporation date    15th August 2017 Public registry record    https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1s98WWDjendq-BYF8 HE6LUKIJ7FAIuREk Registered Agent    ILS SECRETARIES LIMITED, Suite 1701-02 17/F, FWD Financial Centre, 308 Des Vouex Road Central, Hong Kong   BLOCKPASS FOUNDATION Incorporation number    000139M Public registry record    https://services.gov.im/ded/services/companiesregistry/viewcomp any.iom?Id=453650 Registration with Isle of Man Financial Services Authority    https://www.iomfsa.im/registers/designated-business/?Id=46 28 February 2018 Registered Agent    CORPORATE OPTIONS LIMITED THIRD FLOOR, 10-12 PROSPECT HILL, DOUGLAS, IM1 1EJ, Isle of Man  Team: Adam Vaziri - CEO https://www.linkedin.com/in/adamvaziri/ Hans Lombardo - CMO https://www.linkedin.com/in/hanslombardo/ Thomas Leiritz - CTO https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomasleiritz/ Conor Colwell - Special Projects Director https://www.linkedin.com/in/conor-colwell-520718a/ Toan Hoang - Technical Leader https://www.linkedin.com/in/toan-hoang-372ab338/ Mihai Cimpoesu - Smart Contracts Advisor https://www.linkedin.com/in/mcimpoesu/ Junya Yamamoto - Board Advisor https://www.linkedin.com/in/jyama/ Caitlin Betts - Marketing Manager https://www.linkedin.com/in/caitlinkbetts/ Cheryl Francis - Product Marketing https://www.linkedin.com/in/francischeryl/ Guy Davies - Business Development - UK/Europe https://www.linkedin.com/in/guy-davies-80309513/ Danette Wallace - Business Development - Southeast Asia https://www.linkedin.com/in/danettewallace/  Partner Details: Chain of Things - https://www.chainofthings.com/ Infinity Blockchain Labs - https://www.blockchainlabs.asia/ Coinfirm - https://www.coinfirm.io/ Diacle - https://www.diacle.com/ Infinito Wallet - https://www.infinitowallet.io/ Edinburgh Napier University - https://www.napier.ac.uk/ Decentralized Identity Foundation (DIF) - http://identity.foundation/ Trusted IoT Alliance (TIOTA) - https://www.trusted-iot.org/ Holdex - https://holdex.io/ Myki - https://myki.co/ Agora - https://agora.vote/  Project Description : Blockpass : Blockchain-Based Self-Sovereign Identity   Blockpass is a user-centric, self-sovereign identity app designed for seamless and immediate access to regulated services. Blockpass is set to be the first fully-compliant self-sovereign identity application on the market giving users control over their data.   Current online identity solutions use centralised third-party databases to store sensitive user data, these solutions are inaccurate, vulnerable and frequently compromised. Users also have to repeatedly submit KYC data when on-boarding to new services, creating significant delays and increasing administrative costs for merchants. With the Web 3.0 fast approaching, blockchain services will need to be compliant. The first level of compliance is identity verification or know-your-customer (KYC).   Blockpass is designed to meet KYC, AML and GDPR compliance, making it possible to verify users without risking personal information. Identities generated and verified with Blockpass are data secure. Blockpass does not retain any user data, nor is the user data stored on any blockchain. The Blockpass KYC process eliminates having to repeatedly submit KYC data when on-boarding to new services A Blockpass online identity belongs to and is controlled entirely by the user, not a third party ‚óè   Users choose what credentials they want to have verified and signed ‚óè   Users choose where the data is stored (device or cloud) ‚óè   Users manage their information from a secure place easily accessible by only them ‚óè   Users are free to authenticate themselves with regulated services, Dapps, and autonomous Web 3.0 devices seamlessly and immediately   Increasing regulation across the banking, finance, and crypto industries is driving new and innovative requirements such as digital identity solutions. Blockpass is positioned at the intersection of regulatory technology (regtech) and blockchain markets.    As blockchain investment and development has proliferated, the ICO market has greatly increased to $6 billion USD (4.8 billion euros) in 2017. To spearhead the development of digital identity across blockchain technology, the first stepping stone for Blockpass will be providing KYC solutions in the ICO and token securities markets.    Fintech market insider Medici estimates that the regtech industry will reach $118.7 billion USD (96 billion euros) by 2020, and KYC is at the centre of this growth.

The utility of the token is to obtain discount on verification services provided by Blockpass as well as ‚Äúidentity mining‚Äù which rewards users and enterprises providing services for identity verification. Foundation is controlled by Blockpass IDN Limited (company incorporated in Hong Kong)   BLOCKPASS IDN LIMITED Incorporation number : 2566786 Incorporation date : 15th August 2017 Public registry record : https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1s98WWDjendq-BYF8 HE6LUKIJ7FAIuREk Registered Agent : ILS SECRETARIES LIMITED, Suite 1701-02 17/F, FWD Financial Centre, 308 Des Vouex Road Central, Hong Kong   BLOCKPASS FOUNDATION Incorporation number : 000139M Registration with Isle of Man Financial Services Authority :  https://www.iomfsa.im/registers/designated-business/?Id=46 28 February 2018 Registered Agent : CORPORATE OPTIONS LIMITED THIRD FLOOR, 10-12 PROSPECT HILL, DOUGLAS, IM1 1EJ, Isle of Man  Team: Adam Vaziri - CEO https://www.linkedin.com/in/adamvaziri/ Hans Lombardo - CMO https://www.linkedin.com/in/hanslombardo/ Thomas Leiritz - CTO https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomasleiritz/ Conor Colwell - Special Projects Director https://www.linkedin.com/in/conor-colwell-520718a/ Toan Hoang - Marketing Manager https://www.linkedin.com/in/caitlinkbetts/ Cheryl Francis - Product Marketing https://www.linkedin.com/in/francischeryl/ Guy Davies - Business Development - UK/Europe https://www.linkedin.com/in/guy-davies-80309513/ Juhwan Kim - Business Development - North Asia https://www.linkedin.com/in/kimjuhwan/                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Danette Wallace - Business Development - Southeast Asia https://www.linkedin.com/in/danettewallace/  Partner Details: Chain of Things - https://www.chainofthings.com/ Infinity Blockchain Labs - https://www.blockchainlabs.asia/ Coinfirm - https://www.coinfirm.io/ Diacle - https://www.diacle.com/ Infinito Wallet - https://www.infinitowallet.io/ Edinburgh Napier University - https://www.napier.ac.uk/ Decentralized Identity Foundation (DIF) - http://identity.foundation/ Trusted IoT Alliance (TIOTA) - https://www.trusted-iot.org/ Holdex - https://holdex.io/ Myki - https://myki.co/ Agora - https://agora.vote/  Project Description : Blockpass : Blockchain-Based Self-Sovereign Identity   Blockpass is a user-centric, self-sovereign identity app designed for seamless and immediate access to regulated services. Blockpass is set to be the first fully-compliant self-sovereign identity application on the market giving users control over their data.   Current online identity solutions use centralised third-party databases to store sensitive user data, these solutions are inaccurate, vulnerable and frequently compromised. Users also have to repeatedly submit KYC data when on-boarding to new services, creating significant delays and increasing administrative costs for merchants. With the Web 3.0 fast approaching, blockchain services will need to be compliant. The first level of compliance is identity verification or know-your-customer (KYC).   Blockpass is designed to meet KYC, AML and GDPR compliance, making it possible to verify users without risking personal information. Identities generated and verified with Blockpass are data secure. Blockpass does not retain any user data, nor is the user data stored on any blockchain. The Blockpass KYC process eliminates having to repeatedly submit KYC data when on-boarding to new services A Blockpass online identity belongs to and is controlled entirely by the user, not a third party ‚óè   Users choose what credentials they want to have verified and signed ‚óè   Users choose where the data is stored (device or cloud) ‚óè   Users manage their information from a secure place easily accessible by only them ‚óè   Users are free to authenticate themselves with regulated services, Dapps, and autonomous Web 3.0 devices seamlessly and immediately   Increasing regulation across the banking, finance, and crypto industries is driving new and innovative requirements such as digital identity solutions. Blockpass is positioned at the intersection of regulatory technology (regtech) and blockchain markets.    As blockchain investment and development has proliferated, the ICO market has greatly increased to $6 billion USD (4.8 billion euros) in 2017. To spearhead the development of digital identity across blockchain technology, the first stepping stone for Blockpass will be providing KYC solutions in the ICO and token securities markets.    Fintech market insider Medici estimates that the regtech industry will reach $118.7 billion USD (96 billion euros) by 2020, and KYC is at the centre of this growth.

Author: BlockpassIDN
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: This blog post highlights the problem that Blockpass is trying to solve: inefficient KYC and non-self-sovereign identity needs to become a thing of the past. https://medium.com/@blockpass/how-do-you-solve-a-problem-like-kyc-475f214332e4  It's now just over a week until the PASS Token Distribution Event is open. The event will run from 31st of May 2018 to the 30th of November 2018. For more information and updates keep an eye on blockpass.org.

Author: Blockpass
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: We would like to members from this community to join Blockpass as we celebrate the launch of our Token Distribution Event (TDE) and product in Hong Kong on 31 May 2018. Just a brief re~intro to this platform...  Blockpass is a blockchain-linked user centric identity application for regulated industries and the Internet of Everything.  Blockpass gives individuals control over their data and eliminates the painful process of having to constantly submit KYC data for every financial service or retailer they sign up for. For businesses, Blockpass is a shared KYC platform where a pool of pre-verified users is shared between businesses thus reducing the cost and time of on-boarding new customers.  You can find further information information regarding our platform, the PASS Token and our business on our website https://blockpass.org/tokenhttps://blockpass.org/token , our Telegram group (http://t.me/blockpass) and also our blog (https://medium.com/@blockpass/important-information-about-the-blockpass-token-distribution-event-e7d9e3aaac42)  The event is on the 31st of May at The Annex. The evening reception will include evening drinks and light canap√©s followed by speeches from our founders and the much awaited Blockpass application demonstration. We will also have a demo corner available where you can test out the application for yourself.  Agenda  1830 PM - Welcome and registration 1900 PM - Opening remarks, Product demo 1920 PM - Networking drinks and Canap√©s, media session and demo  Please find sign up here:  https://www.eventbrite.com/e/blockpass-official-global-launch-hong-kong-tickets-45847956472  We would like to get as many people from the Hong Kong Blockchain community as possible. So please pass this invite on.  We look forward to seeing you and celebrating our milestone together.

Author: Blockpass
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: The PASS Token Distribution Event (TDE) has been officially launched at our event in Hong Kong. The sale of PASS has already started! https://www.blockpass.org/token      We have built a user-centric, self-sovereign identity solution for regulated industries and the Internet of Everything. Our KYC product is already available for iPhone and Android phones.  We are starting the initial distribution of the Blockpass token (PASS) from 31st May to 30th November via Official Distributors. The purpose of the token is to expand the network of users of Blockpass. When a user receives the token they will need to download the product and conduct KYC with the Blockpass Foundation before they are able to transfer the token on; we refer to this as ‚ÄòSender KYC‚Äô). The utility of the token is to obtain discount on verification services provided by Blockpass as well as ‚Äúidentity mining‚Äù which rewards users and enterprises providing services for identity verification. We have just released the Blockpass v1.1 to Google Play and the App Store.  Project name: Blockpass  Token name: PASS  Token Distribution Event: The token distribution event will take place from 31st May to 30th November 2018. Author: coupable
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: According to an article published yesterday in The Mercle, Blockpass collaborated with BlockEx cryptoexchange who organizes the first distribution event of the PASS token started two days ago. Blockpass is nearly considered as the most promising ICO actually running with an active app for IOS and Android, and a clear vision over the roadmap milestones; it's also described as the first KYC token but i want to remind team and community as well about IcoPass ICO which also developped an app for KYC verifications to be used for ICOs, the app is also available in different platforms but the ICO failed to reach the softcap. Am not trying to make a direct comparaison here because every app has its own features but they are both built for the same purposes so may be wise to discuss IcoPass failure reasons and conditions. More details about IcoPass ICO and product here: IcoPass ANN: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2854220.msg29285234#msg29285234 IcoPass telegram: http://bit.ly/2nsuMTP

Author: Blockpass
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: Thanks for the feedback!  Glad you enjoyed the event zolotokrylin.   coupable - a good point. I think the 'first KYC token' aspect refers to the fact that Blockpass' PASS token is a utility token rather than a cryptocurrency designed to raise money, which ICOPass' seems to be.

Author: coupable
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: I don't see that IcoPass seems to be a cryptocurrency designed to rise money, the product was released before the tokensale start and it is still running even after the ICO failure. IcoPass was also a utility token but didn't succeed to choose the best promotion strategies as few managers from the team are active for community comments and their bounty program has been stopped before the start of the tokensale (think advisors are testing new strategies).  I was intended to read more opinions about this from your community here but as i see BlockPass, even a well-managed project/ICO is not getting a lot of attention, and this is may be considered as another commun point with IcoPass.

Author: Blockpass
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [PASS] Blockpass Product Launch and Token Distribution Event
Body: I read the whitepaper but didn't find any indication that it was a utility token. Is the utility described in one of its blog posts?  If you'd like to join the Blockpass Telegram channel (https://t.me/blockpass) you can see a lot more of what we're doing.  Blockpass has put a lot of effort over the past 6 months into going to events and talking to businesses and as such has generated a huge amount of interest from many different companies in Blockpass' solution. We have launched with a few select partners and are in the process of signing MoUs etc with many others. Over the next few months many more should be announced. You can follow us on social media to keep track of the latest news.
